sentences: "Veider ja hirmus elukas," mõtles poiss, "ei saa mina temast õiget märku."
.. tuli ikka öösel tagasi, nii et tütred iial märku ei saanud, mis ta kaasa oli toonud.
context: The word 'märku' is an Estonian noun that means understanding or comprehension. It appears in the genitive case in these examples (märku), which typically indicates possession or relationship to something else. In the context of the sentences provided, it refers to gaining understanding about someone or something.
